DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Chemoprevention therapy use certain substance try prevent development recurrence cancer . Fruit vegetable extract may effective prevent recurrence development head neck cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized phase II trial study well fruit vegetable extract work prevent recurrence stage I , stage II , stage III , stage IVA , stage IVB head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Fruit Vegetable Extracts Treating Patients With Stage I-IV , Stage IVA/IVB Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare disease-free survival patient stage I-IV ( include stage IVA IVB ) head neck cancer treat fruit vegetable extract vs placebo . - Compare effect extract biomarkers ( p27 expression , cell proliferation Ki-67 , DNA damage , T-cell function ) patient . - Correlate change biomarkers factor ( e.g. , site stage original tumor , tobacco/alcohol use , depression ) patient treat extract . - Compare serum carotenoid antioxidant level ( vitamins A , C , E ) baseline posttreatment patient treated extract . OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study . Patients stratify accord tobacco use ( yes v ) , alcohol consumption ( yes v ) , tumor stage diagnosis ( I vs II v III v IVA v IVB ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral fruit vegetable extract twice daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily . Treatment arm continue 12 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow annually 5 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 200 patient ( 100 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 18 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Curatively treat stage IIV ( include stage IVA IVB ) squamous cell carcinoma upper aerodigestive tract 1 follow primary site : Oral cavity Oropharynx Hypopharynx Larynx Diseasefree least 6 month 3 year completion surgery , radiotherapy , and/or chemotherapy No synchronous tumor PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 18 Performance status Karnofsky 70100 % OR Zubrod 01 Life expectancy At least 6 month Hematopoietic Hemoglobin ≥ 10 g/dL WBC ≥ 3,000/mm^3 Platelet count ≥ 100,000/mm^3 Hepatic Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 mg/dL SGOT ≤ 40 U/L SGPT ≤ 56 U/L Renal Creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dL Other Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception No malignancy within past 5 year except curatively treat head neck squamous cell carcinoma , nonmelanoma skin cancer , carcinoma situ cervix No serious medical psychiatric illness would preclude give informed consent No nausea ≥ grade 2 PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy See Disease Characteristics More 6 month le 3 year since prior chemotherapy No concurrent chemotherapy No concurrent chemopreventive agent Endocrine therapy More 6 month le 3 year since prior hormonal therapy Radiotherapy See Disease Characteristics More 6 month le 3 year since prior radiotherapy No concurrent radiotherapy Surgery See Disease Characteristics More 6 month le 3 year since prior surgery No concurrent surgery Other More 6 month le 3 year since prior investigational agent More 2 month since prior highdose vitamin ( i.e. , 10 time recommended daily allowance [ 8,00010,000 IU vitamin A , 600 mg vitamin C , 80100 IU vitamin E ] )
